entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Carignan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:24 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow this morning. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
